# UIHoverAutomaticEffect

**Structure**

A system-default hover effect that automatically selects the appropriate effect based on the view to which it applies.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIHoverAutomaticEffect
```

## Creating an automatic hover effect

- **init()**: Creates a system-default hover effect that automatically selects the appropriate effect based on the view to which it applies.

## Specifying a hover effect

- **effect**: The effect to apply to the view with this style.
- **UIHoverHighlightEffect**: An effect that applies a highlight to the view on hover.
- **UIHoverLiftEffect**: An effect that can visually lift the view on hover where appropriate.
- **UIHoverEffect**: A hover effect that can apply to a view through a hover style.

## Conforms To

- UIHoverEffect
